body.p: ePSD2 relies heavily on the work of other projects for its corpora, including the following:

dl.dd: ePSD2's administrative corpora are largely derived from CDLI and lemmatized by the ePSD staff
Kassite royal inscriptions are included directly from CKST
ePSD2's lexical corpus is included directly from DCCLT
ePSD2's Old Babylonian Sumerian literature corpus is based on the ETCSL corpus
